hero.title: Transform Your Ideas into Reality
hero.description: At <bold>{{appName}}</bold>, we focus on delivering practical solutions that help small businesses succeed online. Let us help you turn your ideas into a user-friendly website.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We provide a range of services designed to help you build and maintain a successful online presence. Whether you need a new website or ongoing support, we're here to assist.

options.title: Website Design
options.description: Creating simple, clean, and effective web designs that look great on all devices and are easy for your customers to use.

options.title: Website Development
options.description: Building reliable and efficient websites that help you connect with your audience and achieve your business goals.

options.title: Website Maintenance
options.description: Offering ongoing support to ensure your website runs smoothly, including updates, security checks, and performance improvements.

features.title: What We Offer
features.description: We provide dependable web solutions tailored to your needs. Our focus is on delivering value with straightforward and effective services.

options.title: Clear and Open Communication
options.description: We keep you informed at every step, so you know exactly what’s happening with your project.

options.title: Flexible Communication
options.description: We’re here to make things easy for you—whether you prefer emails, calls, or meetings, we adapt to your needs.

options.title: Customized Solutions
options.description: Your business is unique, and we provide tailored solutions that address your specific needs and goals.

options.title: Modern Solutions
options.description: We use up-to-date, user-friendly technology to create websites that perform well and look great.

options.title: Unlimited Requests
options.description: Need changes? We handle unlimited requests, ensuring that your website evolves with your business.

options.title: Support and Aftercare
options.description: We promise ongoing support and aftercare, ensuring that you continue to benefit from our services long after the initial purchase.

about.title: About Appstatis
about.message:
Welcome to Appstatis! I’m Pavel Bogatõr (Paul), and I’m here to help small businesses succeed online. As a dedicated web designer and developer, I offer personalized service to ensure your website meets your needs.

Currently a software engineering student and an intern, I bring a fresh perspective and a commitment to practical solutions. Let’s work together to create a website that’s effective and easy to manage.

For more information or to get in touch, visit my personal page or email me at paul@appstatis.com.

Looking forward to working with you!

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Our pricing is straightforward and designed to fit your needs. Choose from our clear and simple options or contact us for a custom plan.

options.title: One-Time Payment
options.description: Perfect for a complete project with no ongoing commitments.

options.title: Monthly Subscription
options.description: Ideal for ongoing needs and support.
features: Additional charges may apply for third-party services.

options.title: Custom Plan
options.description: Have unique requirements? Let’s discuss a custom plan that fits your needs.

questions.question: How do you handle communication during the project?
questions.answer: We communicate primarily via email, messenger, or any other method that is most convenient for you. We prioritize flexibility to ensure smooth communication throughout the project.

questions.question: What about payments?
questions.answer: For project-based work, we require a 30% upfront payment before starting. The remaining balance will be invoiced upon project completion. For subscription services, invoices will be sent at the beginning of each billing period.

questions.question: How can I cancel my subscription?
questions.answer: To cancel your subscription, please contact us via email or messenger. Your subscription will remain active until the end of the current billing period.

questions.question: What support do you offer after launch?
questions.answer: We provide ongoing support, including technical assistance, bug fixes, and performance enhancements to keep your website in top shape.

questions.question: What if I need changes during the project?
questions.answer: We accommodate changes and updates as needed. Just let us know through your preferred communication method.

contact.title: Prefer to Text Us?
contact.message: If you’d rather not call, you can always send us a message.

form.name: Name

errors.name: Name must be at least 2 characters long
errors.message: Message must be at least 10 characters long

form.success: Thank you for your message. We will get back to you soon.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.description: Welcome to Appstatis! These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Appstatis's Website, located at www.appstatis.com.

section1.title: Acceptance of Terms
section1.description: By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use Appstatis if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.

section2.title: Payments
section2.description: Appstatis offers services under both a one-time payment and a subscription-based model. Details about the scope of services, as well as any fees associated with these services, will be provided on our website or through a direct communication with you.

section3.title: Subscription Terms
section3.description: For subscription-based services, you will be billed in advance on a recurring and periodic basis. Your subscription will automatically renew under the exact same conditions unless you cancel it or Appstatis cancels it. A valid payment method, including credit card, is required to process the payment for your subscription.

section4.title: Refunds
section4.description: Refunds for services by Appstatis are only available under specific circumstances. A non-refundable deposit is required at the start of any project to cover initial resources and labor costs. Should you choose to discontinue the project part-way, a refund may be considered on a pro-rata basis, based on the completion status of the project. All requests for refunds must be made formally in writing within 7 days of the last submitted milestone. We reserve the right to first attempt to rectify any issues before issuing a refund.

section5.title: Cancellation
section5.description: You may cancel your subscription at any time. Please note that there will be no refunds for the fees already paid, except as may be required by applicable law.

section6.title: Modifications to Service and Prices
section6.description: Prices for our services are subject to change without notice. We reserve the right at any time to modify or discontinue the Service (or any part or content thereof) without notice at any time.

section7.title: Governing Law
section7.description: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Estonia, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Our failure to enforce any right or provision of these Terms will not be considered a waiver of those rights. If any provision of these Terms is held to be invalid or unenforceable by a court, the remaining provisions of these Terms will remain in effect. These Terms constitute the entire agreement between us regarding our Service, and supersede and replace any prior agreements we might have had between us regarding the Service.

section8.title: Changes to Terms
section8.description: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material we will provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion.

footer.title: Contact Us
footer.description: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at <emailLink>paul@appstatis.com</emailLink>

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: Your privacy is important to us. It is Appstatis's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website, and other sites we own and operate.

section1.title: Information We Collect
section1.description: We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we're collecting it and how it will be used.

section2.title: Use of Information
section2.description: The information we collect is used to enhance the services we offer, to personalize your user experience, and to prefill your Appstatis account details where applicable.

section3.title: Retention of Information
section3.description: We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service. What data we store, we'll protect within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use, or modification.

section4.title: Sharing of Information
section4.description: We don't share any personally identifying information publicly or with third-parties, except when required to by law.

section5.title: Data Protection
section5.description: Appstatis acts in the capacity of both a data controller and a data processor with regard to the personal data processed through our services in terms of the applicable data protection laws, including the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

section6.title: External Sites
section6.description: Our website may link to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites and cannot accept responsibility or liability for their respective privacy policies.

section7.title: Your Rights
section7.description: You are free to refuse our request for your personal information, with the understanding that we may be unable to provide you with some of your desired services.

section8.title: Acceptance of This Policy
section8.description: Your continued use of our website will be regarded as acceptance of our practices around privacy and personal information.

footer.title: Contact Us
footer.description: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at <emailLink>paul@appstatis.com</emailLink>

unsubscribe.title: We're sad to see you go, but we respect your inbox
unsubscribe.description: Enter your email below to stop receiving our emails.
